hubris:Befuddled.NAME: Befuddled
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card drawn each turn is transformed.

is shuffled into your draw pile.

hubris:Unfocused.NAME: Unfocused
DESCRIPTIONS: On taking Attack damage, loses #b1 Focus. Cannot go below 0 Focus.

DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, immediately start another turn. NL Energy and Block are maintained.
